findings: Added recurring cron governance job: `Control room issue triage + QA intake` (09:35/13:35/17:35/21:35 CT) for issue monitoring + QA ticket intake.
Added GitHub issue templates for QA bugs and product improvements.
Opened initial QA backlog tickets from live review:
#1 [QA] Deduplicate overlapping entries in Overview Next lane
#2 [UX] Remove duplicate heading stacks inside collapsible panels
Added issue snapshot tooling (`scripts/issue_snapshot.py`) + tests and documented ticket-linked commit rule (`refs #<issue>`).

jobSuccessTrend.job: Autonomy daily planner (DAILY_PLAN source of truth)
Downtime gap auto-fill guard (quiet unless triggered)

activity.text: Added release-notes extraction utility + tests (`scripts/extract_release_notes.py`, `scripts/tests/test_extract_release_notes.py`).
Released and published `v1.0.0`:
Release: https://github.com/SeanKudrna/claw-control-room/releases/tag/v1.0.0
Updated gist status payload after release so runtime dashboard data includes `controlRoomVersion: 1.0.0`.
Fixed stale dashboard state where `Current Focus` could show `n/a` and `Now` could remain on old time windows.
Implemented timeline-aware stale fallback in `scripts/lib/status_builder.py` so active/focus/now lanes follow current `DAILY_PLAN.md` window when `TODAY_STATUS.md` lags.
Added tests for stale active-work fallback and timeline-aware now-lane rendering.
Released as patch version `v1.0.1` with tag + GitHub release: https://github.com/SeanKudrna/claw-control-room/releases/tag/v1.0.1
Follow-up patch v1.0.2 shipped to filter stale time-passed items out of `Next` swimlane; tag/release created and gist payload refreshed.
Implemented tabbed dashboard IA to avoid single-page infodump:
Overview
Operations
Insights
Added collapsible containers for major sections using native details/summary UX.
Added hash-persisted tab state (`#tab-overview`, `#tab-operations`, `#tab-insights`) for direct linking and state restore.
Released `v1.1.0` with tag + GitHub release: https://github.com/SeanKudrna/claw-control-room/releases/tag/v1.1.0
Sean set explicit directive: control-room is a continuously improving product lane owned by Claw (UI/UX/usability/functionality/transparency), with autonomous roadmap management.
Added recurring cron governance job: `Control room issue triage + QA intake` (09:35/13:35/17:35/21:35 CT) for issue monitoring + QA ticket intake.
Added GitHub issue templates for QA bugs and product improvements.
Opened initial QA backlog tickets from live review:
#1 [QA] Deduplicate overlapping entries in Overview Next lane
#2 [UX] Remove duplicate heading stacks inside collapsible panels
Added issue snapshot tooling (`scripts/issue_snapshot.py`) + tests and documented ticket-linked commit rule (`refs #<issue>`).
